commit_title: Add histogram support and UI controls
commit_message:
Introduce histogram mode across stores, UI and plot generation.

- AxisSideMenu: add plotType to state, radio buttons to switch between scatter/histogram, and hide the X-axis drop target when histogram is selected. Expose setPlotType and include plotType in loadProject/createAxisSideMenuConfig.
- PlotLayoutStore: add histogramBins to PlotLayout state with setter.
- PlotLayout component: add local controls for histogram bins (start, end, size, underflow, overflow) and persist via setHistogramBins when saving layout.
- PlotlyHelpers.generatePlotConfig: support histogram mode by adjusting hasData checks, creating histogram traces with xbins/autobinx, applying underflow/overflow handling, using value-based x-axis/title text, and emitting appropriate code for histogram traces. Adjust scatter behavior to remain unchanged.

These changes enable building histograms with configurable binning while preserving existing scatter functionality.
